ROB.raw_line: You're crazy!Alvy, you're a total paranoid.Ah, Max, you, uh ...Why, Max? It's a good name for you. Max, you see conspiracies in everything.Right, Max. Alvy Well, uh ... you and me against them?Yeah, watch the road!I can't wait to see the old neighborhood.We can show her the schoolyard.Yes, I remember. He was all schoolyard. Your mother and father fighting all the time.They can't hear you, Max.Hey, Max! Who's that?Tessie, they say you were the sister with personality.Uh, how did this personality come about?There were many men interested in you?That's pretty hard to believe.I've never been so relaxed as I have been since I moved out here, Max. I want you to see my house. I live right next to Hugh Hefner's house, Max. He lets me use the Jacuzzi.
